members.add.review.tags.to.features: Add review tags to individual features

members.attribute.conflation.ref.tag.overwrite.e: Reference feature tags not to be overwritten
members.attribute.conflation.suppress.building.t: Suppress building tags on multi-polygon relation building members

members.differential.remove.unconflatable.data: Remove unconflatable data in the secondary input from the output
members.differential.treat.reviews.as.matches: Treat reviews as matches and remove from the output
members.differential.snap.unconnected.roads: Snap unconnected secondary roads to reference roads
members.snap.unconnected.ways.snap.tolerance: Maximum distance, in meters, to allow snapping unconnected roads to existing roads
members.snap.unconnected.ways.use.existing.way.n: Reuse existing road nodes when snapping unconnected roads
Maximum distance, in meters, to allow snapping unconnected roads to existing road nodes

members.building.changed.review: Create reviews when a building has changed
members.building.changed.review.iou.threshold: Intersection over Union threshold below which the changed review is triggered
members.building.force.contained.match: Force matches when one building contains another
members.building.keep.more.complex.geometry.when: Keep more complex geometry when merging
members.building.merge.many.to.many.matches: Always merge many to many matches
members.building.review.if.secondary.newer: Review if secondary feature is newer
members.building.review.matches.other.than.one.t: Review matches that are not one to one

members.generic.line.tag.threshold: Tag similarity for generic lines not conflatable by any specific conflation routine

members.generic.point.tag.threshold: Tag similarity for generic points not conflatable by any specific conflation routine

members.generic.point.polygon.tag.threshold: Tag similarity for generic pairs of points and polygons not conflatable by any specific conflation routine

members.generic.polygon.tag.threshold: Tag similarity for generic polygons not conflatable by any specific conflation routine

members.poi.polygon.additional.search.distance: Additional search radius (m) to look for matches
members.poi.polygon.allow.cross.conflation.mergi: Allow merging of Building and POI to Polygon matches
members.poi.polygon.disable.same.source.conflati: Match key prefix only if same source conflation disabled
members.poi.polygon.keep.closest.matches.only: Keep only the closest match only
members.poi.polygon.promote.points.with.addresse: Promote points with addresses to POIs
members.poi.polygon.review.multiuse.buildings: Review POI matches with multi-use buildings
members.poi.polygon.source.tag.key: Source key used when disabling same source conflation
